description:
Navigate and refactor your code with ease

An IDE built on top of a canvas, Haystack takes care of the tedious and confusing parts of coding for you
Some fixes:
1. Transitioned GitHub authentication to use OAuth instead of a GitHub app
   1. This removes the need for a repo owner to authorize the app
2. Fixed bug where the references container would not be long enough to see all references
3. Fixed incoming/outgoing call UI being broken
4. Fixed issue where scrolling in the pull request editor would not work
5. Many improvements and fixes to web Haystack
   1. Fixed issue where zooming in/out would zoom in/out the browser
   2. Fixed issue where scrolling horizontally forwards/backwards would go back/forward in the browser
